title: How to unsubscribe from Walmart+
description: You can cancel your Walmart+ membership by contacting customer support or through your Walmart account online or via the app. After canceling, you can continue to use your benefits until the end of your current billing cycle.

steps_1.title: Cancel Walmart+ Membership via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Walmart+ membership via the website:

*   Go to your Walmart account on the Walmart website.
*   Select "Account," then "Walmart+".
*   Select "Manage membership".
*   Select "Manage" beside Walmart+ plan.
*   Select "Cancel membership".
*   Choose a reason for canceling.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

steps_2.title: Cancel Walmart+ Membership via Mobile App
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Walmart+ membership via the mobile app:

*   Go to your Walmart account on the Walmart app.
*   Select "Account," then "Walmart+".
*   Select "Manage membership".
*   Select "Manage" beside Walmart+ plan.
*   Select "Cancel membership".
*   Choose a reason for canceling.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

steps_3.title: Cancel Walmart+ Membership via Phone
steps_3.description:
To cancel your Walmart+ membership via phone:

*   Call Walmart Customer Care at (800) 924-9206 to cancel your membership.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Walmart+ subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to cancel via phone, online, or through the Walmart app. Ensure you cancel before the next billing cycle to avoid unwanted charges.
